title: 裝備
texttw: 良好的配件有助於我們取得更好的成績，我們可以利用[ff6060]突觸強化[-]來增加自身的能力！！
texten: Items help enhance your performance on the court, you can [ff6060] upgrade them [-] to increase their ability!

texttw: 我們先來強化可以有效提升[ff6060]射籃命中率[-]的[ff6060]顱部插件[-]吧！！
texten: Lets make the first upgrade of the headplug, [ff6060] it will help you increase [-] your [ff6060] field goal [-] percentage!

texttw: 只要點擊右邊的[ff6060]鑲嵌材料[-]，即可進行第一階段的強化囉。
texten: Click on the [ff6060] materials [-] to complete the first part of the upgrade.

texttw: 當插件已經鑲嵌滿星星後，即可進行[ff6060]進化合成[-]了，進化後可大幅提升自身能力值喔。
texten: When the plug's stars are all full, you can proceed [ff6060] to upgrade it [-], which will significantly increase its ability.

texttw: 有沒有感覺自己的能力又更上一層了呢？
texten: Don't you wanna take it to the next level?

title: Avatar
texttw: 剛剛的勝利獲得了很酷的[ff6060]造型服裝[-]喔，快來搭配屬於自己的造型吧。
texten: That was an awesome victory! [ff6060] Why not celebrate it with style?  [-] Come an leave your mark.

texttw: 選擇[ff6060]背部飾品[-]種類。
texten: Select [ff6060] the kind of  [-] backwear you like.

texttw: 造型服裝都有限定的[ff6060]時限[-]，除非把它買下來，否則時間到期就不能再穿了。
texten: Not sure if this style suits you huh? [ff6060] No worries [-], you can try this item for a short period of time.

texttw: 而且買新造型還可以增加自己的[ff6060]潛能[-]喔！！
texten: When you buy an item, you'll get style [ff6060] attribution points [-] !

texttw: 點擊[ff6060]物品圖示[-]就可以把它穿起來了！！
texten: Click [ff6060] the Item icon [-] to try it out

texttw: 哇，好看極了！！可以穿出去嚇嚇對手囉！！
texten: Awesome! Look at yourself! Now go out there and beat some punks in the court.

title: 商店
texttw: 隨著競賽的進行，可能會有些資源上的不足，聯盟這邊有一個[ff6060]購物商店[-]可以讓您補充自己想要的東西。
texten: As the games goes on, competition becomes tougher. [ff6060] Try some of the different stores, [-] you'll find useful items there.

texttw: 這邊有眾多豐富的商品，分別可以使用 [ff00eb]寶石[-]、[fff300]金幣[-]、[a200ff]聯盟幣[-]、[00ff6b]社群幣[-] 來進行購買。
texten: Different stores have different kind of items. [ff00eb] Gems [-], [fff300] gold [-], [a200ff] PVP Coins [-], [00ff6b] Challenge Coins [-] Each currency can be used in a different store.

texttw: 各商店的商品每隔一段時間會進行[ff6060]更換[-]，記得要常常回來逛逛是否有[ff6060]新商品上架[-]唷。
texten: Each store merchandise will be [ff6060] Replaced from time to time [-], remember to always come back to check what [ff6060] new product has been added[-].

texttw: 如果等不及想要快點看看有什麼新商品，可以點擊下方的[ff6060]刷新按鈕[-]，就可以立即的更換新的商品喔！！！
texten: Can't wait for the goods huh? You can click the [ff6060] refresh button [-], to immediately replace the current items!

title: 社群
texttw: 由於你前幾場競賽搶眼的表現，我們發現有其他球員開始在[ff6060]關注[-]你的動態唷！！
texten: I've been hearing your name in the streets more and more, people is starting to pay attention to you  [ff6060] and that's great! [-] But remember to watch your back!

texttw: 這麼酷，快帶我瞧瞧是誰在關注我！！
texten: Well ain't that something? So who's been talking about me?!

texttw: 這邊有許多來自各地的優秀球員，你可以選擇其中一位球員進行[ff6060]關注[-]！！
texten: Some of the world's best b-ballers are gather here, you can choose one of these punks [ff6060] to play on your team [-]!

texttw: 你已經成功關注他了，現在你可以在[ff6060]動態牆[-]上看到你所有關注朋友的動態消息喔！！
texten: You are successfully following this homie! Now you can see his wall [ff6060] [-] and his activity.

texttw: 接下我們來幫被你關注的朋友點個[ff6060]讚[-]吧！！
texten: Let me show you how to use all the [ff6060] Social [-] features! !

texttw: 只要你在朋友的動態訊息上點擊[ff6060]讚[-]，就可以獲得[ff6060]社群幣[-]唷，可以讓你去購買[ff6060]社群商店的商品[-]。
texten: [ff6060]Liking[-] your friends' status will, award you [ff6060] social coins! [-] Allowing you to buy [ff6060] merchandise in the social store.[-].

title: Skill
texttw: 剛剛獲得到一張[ff6060]技能晶片[-]，這是幹嘛的呀？
texten: Just got a [ff6060] skill card [-], what's up with this thing?

texttw: [ff6060]技能晶片[-]是運用科技，讓我們能夠獲得超乎常人的能力，如果晶片運用得當，將對比賽的結果造成[ff6060]決定性的影響[-]。我來教你怎麼安裝它。
texten: [Ff6060] Skill cards [-] are very high tech items that grant you special skills in the court, when used properly, they can change the  [ff6060] outcome of the game [-]. I'll teach you how to use them.

texttw: 首先我們可以先往下一場競賽邁進。
texten: First, lets play a match.

texttw: 繼續點擊[ff6060]競賽開始[-]。
texten: Click  [ff6060] play [-].

texttw: 在開始競賽前，我們快把剛剛獲得的[ff6060]技能晶片[-]裝上吧！！
texten: Before starting the game, lets select the skill cards [ff6060] we're gonna [-] use!

texttw: 技能晶片分為[ff6060]主動技[-]跟[ff6060]被動技[-]，只要[ff6060]點擊[-]技能晶片，即可開啟對應的功能。
texten: Skills cards are divided into two types: [ff6060] Cards with active skills,[-] and [ff6060] Cards with passive skills. [-] You can click  [ff6060] on the cards [-] to check their info.

texttw: 接下來點擊[ff6060]裝備晶片[-]即可將晶片安裝到自己身上。
texten: Next, click [ff6060] Equip card [-] to use the card on the game.

texttw: 這樣就完成了，他已經出現[ff6060]右側[-]的已安裝區，我們可以按[ff6060]上一步[-]回到剛剛的賽前準備區了。
texten: After you equip the skill card, [ff6060] you can see your selected cards on the right side [-] of the screen, you can [ff6060] arrange [-] your cards before each game.

texttw: 接下來就是去競賽中大展身手囉！！
texten: Now you can see the effects of skill cards on a match!

title: 任務
texttw: 經歷了幾場競賽，你已經累積了屬於自己的成績，聯盟這邊有幫你準備[ff6060]任務成就[-]的統計，可以讓你檢視自己辛苦的成果。
texten: You've already experienced a couple of matches and you have started accumulating achievements.  The league keeps track of your [ff6060] mission accomplishments, [-] statistics, and allows you to view the results of your hard work.

texttw: 目前你已經達成球員生涯的第一項任務，往後還有更多的挑戰等你來達成喔。
texten: You have successfully finished the first task of your career, later there will be more challenges waiting for you tho!

texttw: 可以領取你剛剛達成的任務獎勵！！
texten: Your hard earned reward!

title: 晶片抽取
texttw: [ff6060]技能抽取[-]可以快速增加你的戰力，每天都有[ff6060]免費[-]的次數可以進行抽取！！
texten: [Ff6060] Skill Extraction [-] allows you to quickly increase your overall power. Every day [ff6060] you have a free [-] number of extractions!

texttw: 記得在倒數時間結束後再回來抽喔．
texten: Don't forget to return at the end of the countdown.

title: PVP
texttw: 嗨，明日之星您好！！
texten: Yo, newbie! I've heard you're the flavor of the month.

texttw: 哈哈，你這樣稱呼我會讓我受寵若驚！！
texten: I'm flattered!

texttw: 是這樣的，由於您優異的表現，獲得了[ff6060]宇宙聯盟總會[-]的關注，因此總會想要邀請您加入宇宙聯盟的聯賽，讓您有機會與宇宙中的強者有[ff6060]一較高下[-]的機會。
texten: You've shown an excellent performance kid, now the [ff6060] galaxy league has put their [-] attention on you. They want  you to join the League, which is a very rare opportunity. You know only the strongest players are invited to join, [ff6060 ] you [-] can't miss this chance.

texttw: 加入聯盟之後會有豐厚的報酬等著您喔。
texten: After joining the league you'll get a nice reward.

texttw: 這麼酷，那我當然要加入。
texten: Do you even have to ask? I've been waiting for this for a long time.

texttw: 太好了，讓我來告訴您該如何加入！！
texten: Great, then let me show you how to join!

texttw: 在這裡選擇進入[ff6060]聯盟挑戰[-]。
texten: Click here to enter [ff6060] the League challenges [-].

texttw: 一開始您會從[ff6060]街頭聯盟[-]開始打起，隨著積分的改變，將會決定您聯盟等級的升降，越高級的聯盟可以獲得越高的報酬喔！！
texten: You'll start from scratch [ff6060] on street Alliance,  [-] as you keep on playing, your league will increase which will allow you to enter higher challenges and get higher rewards.

texttw: 現在來開始您的第一次挑戰吧！！
texten: Time for your first challenge !

texttw: 這邊會顯示您這場競賽的對手，如果沒有問題就可以直接開始了！！
texten: Here you'll see your opponents, you can challenge them!

title: 副本
texttw: 生涯競賽中的每個關主都有屬於他們的籃球故事，快來挑戰他們體驗他們的故事，打贏他們甚至有機會獲得他們身上的[ff6060]寶物[-]或珍貴的[ff6060]技能晶片[-]喔！！
texten: Every challenge is unique and the challenge's bosses have a different backgrounds, know their stories and try to beat them. You'll have a chance to win their equipment, [ff6060] items, [-] and even their precious [ff6060] skill cards [-] !

texttw: 我早就想要再次跟他們多多學習，快跟我說怎樣找到他們！
texten: I've wanted to face some of those punks for a long time... Tell me how to find them!

texttw: 這就是你之前遇到的關主，現在可以再次挑戰他囉！！不過要注意，他們這次不會放水了，會拿出真本事來對付你唷！！並且你要注意這系列挑戰的[ff6060]特性[-]。
texten: You can now challenge the boss again! However, this time he won't take it easy on you ! You should also pay attention to the series of challenges [ff6060] in the game [-].

texttw: 這邊開始有一些前置關卡，當你挑戰完這些關卡後，就可以正式挑戰關主了，加油！！
texten: Why don't we play a couple of warm up matches? After that you'll be ready to challenge the stage boss!

texttw: 隨著您的成長，聯盟這邊有準備一些[ff6060]每日考驗[-]給您，只要您完成考驗，就可以獲得到獎勵喔！！
texten: As you level up, the league will prepare some [ff6060] Daily challenges [-] for  you, complete them to earn tons of rewards.

texttw: 這邊的考驗都是[ff6060]每天計算[-]一次喔，所以要把握時間完成他們喔！！
texten: This are today's [ff6060] challenges! [-] Don't take your sweet time...

texttw: 我現在來帶你完成
texten: Let's get down to business then.

title: 投點教學
texttw: 嗨，這裡是[ff6060]潛能成長[-]區，在這裏可以激發自己的潛能，讓自己的能力更上一層樓喔！！
texten: Now... this here are [ff6060] your overall skills. [-] You can increase each one of them with attribution points  and take your game to the next level!

texttw: 哇，是喔，那該怎麼提升自己的能力啊！！
texten: So this is how I enhance my skills huh! Not too shabby...

texttw: 只要你每次[ff6060]提升等級[-]，或者藉由購買造型外觀都可以獲得[ff6060]潛能點數[-]
texten: Every time you level up, [ff6060] or when you [-], purchase items, you'll get attribution points which you can use [ff6060] to increase  your overall skills. [-]

texttw: 當有技能點數後，只要點擊各數值的[ff6060]＋[-]按鈕，即可增加對應的數值唷，快來試試吧！！
texten: When you have attribution points, choose the skill you wanna enhance and press the [ff6060] + [-] to increase 1 point of that skill. You can use all your points in a single skill or different ones!

title: 技能升星
texttw: 剛剛獲得[ff6060]我愛籃球黑幫[-]技能晶片，這又是幹嘛的呀？
texten: Just got a [ff6060] I Love Basketball Gangs[-]skill card, what's up with this thing?

texttw: 這是個好東西！！這張晶片可以幫助你提升你擁有的技能晶片強度喔！！
texten: This is a good thing! ! This card can help you enhance your own skills card's strength! !

texttw: 這麼厲害！！快教我怎麼強化！！
texten: It's awesome!! Teach me how to enhance it!!

texttw: 右側有一些你現在擁有的技能晶片，所有晶片都可以作為強化的材料，不過注意，晶片被當作強化後就會消失了！！
texten: On the right,there is something you now have the skills cards, these cards can be used as all reinforced material, but notce, the card  will disappear after being the material! !

texttw: 選擇剛剛的[ff6060]我愛籃球黑幫[-]技能晶片作為材料吧
texten: Choose [ff6060] I Love Basketball Gangs[-] .

texttw: 這樣就強化成功囉！！
texten: That's over!!

title: 主介面
texttw: 這就是將來會發生的事...若不在未來贏得這場比賽，這個星球會毀滅的！
texten: Hey Hey hey! ! You're still  here? Go play some ball now!

texttw: 我知道了！但我該如何開始呢？
texten: I was just having this awesome dream.. I was the best player in the world!

texttw: 我們得贏得這一屆星際籃球大賽的冠軍，才能改變未來的結局！
texten: The best player? Give me a break, with your current level you can't even beat me!

texttw: 先從成為出色的籃球員開始，競賽能累積豐厚的經驗以及獎金，不僅能償還債務！也能朝目標邁進！
texten: OK OK! ! Stop loosing time and start shooting some balls.

texttw: 債務⋯哎～明明就是你撞破我家的屋頂⋯。
texten: Sure, let's go!

texttw: 哈哈哈，先別說這個了！我們進入[ff6060]生涯競賽[-]－
texten: First, enter [ff6060] STORY [-]

texttw: 再來選擇第一場競賽－
texten: Select the first match.

texttw: 確認這場比賽的[ff6060]獲勝條件[-]之後，就可以繼續進入下一步了。
texten: After you [ff6060] beat a stage [-], you can  proceed to the next one.

texttw: 這裡是你這場比賽的[ff6060]隊友[-]，確認完畢就可以開始競賽了。
texten: This are your [ff6060] teammates [-] for the match. If your ok with them lets start playing!

title: 第二關打完
texttw: 哇，連續取得獲勝耶，我們繼續挑戰下一組對手吧！！
texten: Awesome! You're on a winning strike! Let's go to the next match.

title: 通過第一章
texttw: 哇，您已經成功挑戰了第一章節的關主，我們可以離開貧民窟，往下一章邁進囉。
texten: Congratulations! You've successfully finished the first chapter! Time to move on... Say goodbye to everything you know

title: 取名
texttw: 由於你前幾場競賽搶眼的表現，我們發現有其他球員開始在[ff6060]關注[-]你的動態唷！！
texten: I've been hearing your name in the streets more and more, people is starting to pay attention to you  [ff6060] and that's great! [-] But remember to watch your back!

texttw: 但是，我還不知道你的名字呢？
texten: I've heard of your skills,.. haven't heard your name ...

texttw: 喔，我叫...
texten: The name is ...

title: PVP結束後
texttw: 恭喜您獲得聯盟賽首場勝利，正式加入宇宙聯盟賽的體系！！這是您加入的報酬！！
texten: Congratulations on your first victory in the league tournament, You're officially part of the league now! This is your reward!

texttw: 今後您可以每天回來這裏領取您的[ff6060]聯盟薪資[-]，切記，聯盟層級越高，報酬也越高喔！！
texten: Come back here tomorrow to pick up your [ff6060] daily league reward [-], remember, the higher you move in the ladder, the higher your reward is gonna be!

title: 新教學
texttw: 哇啊！你、你是誰？怎麼撞破我家的屋頂⋯糟糕了啦！
texten: Wow ah! Who are you? How crashed through the roof of my house ⋯ bad it!

texttw: ⋯⋯啊！這裡是什麼地方！
texten: ⋯Where am I?

texttw: 別緊張，我叫潔西卡，最喜歡的食物是⋯哎呀！不是說這個的時候了！
texten: Take easy, my name is Jessica, favorite food is ⋯ Oops! It's not a time chatting!

texttw: 你現在被我拉進了時空夾層的夢境中，必須完成這場夢境的目標才能夠醒來，否則就再也醒不過來了！
texten: You must complete this dream goal to be able to wake up, otherwise it could wake up to!

texttw: 什麼！？你⋯那、那我要完成什麼樣的目標！？
texten: WHAT?

texttw: 你必須贏得這場比賽！我會在一旁給你提示，很快就能完成的！快跟上－－
texten: You have to win this game! I will lead you. Come on!

texttw: 首先，頭頂[ff6666]紅色[-]三角形的球員是你自己．你也只能移動你自己的角色。
texten: The avatar with the [ff6666] red triangle [-] is your character! You can only control your own character.

texttw: 你只可以操作紅色三角形頭標球員移動。
texten: Now, move the joystick to the place you wanna go!

texttw: 現在，先操作搖桿移動到指定的地方吧！
texten: Now, move the joystick until you reach this spot!

texttw: 旁邊[6666ff]藍色[-]、[66ff66]綠色[-]三角形頭標的球員是你的隊友，你無法控制他們的移動。
texten: The characters with the [6666ff] Blue [-], [66ff66] and Green [-] triangles are your teammates, you can not control their movement

texttw: [6666ff]藍色[-]頭標是隊友A
texten: [6666ff] Blue [-] mark is teammate A.

texttw: [66ff66]綠色[-]頭標是隊友B
texten: [66ff66] Green [-] mark is teammate B.

texttw: 既然敵方防守球員站那麼遠，我們給他們一個驚喜吧！！
texten: Your opponents are distracted, let's give them a surprise!

texttw: 趁他們不注意，我們可以來嘗試一下抄截。
texten: Let's steal the ball while we can!

texttw: 首先移動到指定的位置！！
texten: First, move to the specified location!

texttw: 趁現在可以使用抄截了！！
texten: Now you can steal the ball!

texttw: 瞧他們慌亂的，小心，有兩位敵對球員正朝你而來。
texten: Look at their panic! But gotta be careful, they'll do anything to get the ball back.

texttw: 可以使用肘擊，防止他們靠近。
texten: You can hit them with your elbow, to prevent them getting too close to your ball.

texttw: 趁現在有空擋了，可以試著傳給隊友。
texten: Even though you can't control your teammates, they'll always be there ready to help you.

texttw: 也可以再指揮隊友回傳給你！！
texten: You can always make your teamates pass the ball back to you.

texttw: 好啦，不要玩了，該給他們一個再見絕殺了。
texten: Thats enough for today... Give this street punks a chance to rest.

texttw: 這場競賽我們必須要達成限定的[fff400]灌籃次數[-]，才可以取得這個關卡的勝利。
texten: Now show me you can dunk [fff400] to [-] beat this level

texttw: 條件有點困難，所以要記得要好好利用剛剛所安裝的[fff400]技能晶片[-]喔！！
texten: Seems like this a little to hard for ya! Use the skill cards!

texttw: 戰況有些膠著，我們要好好把握這次的進攻！！
texten: The score has been real tight, you have to deliver on every possession!

texttw: 適時的喊話讓士氣提升了不少耶。
texten: The score has been real tight, you have to deliver on every possession!

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 太好了、太好了！你越來越厲害了呢！

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 剛才那幾場只是讓你！這場和我『絕殺比爾』比賽三分球吧！

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 看看最後是誰贏得獎金！

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 我們一定要獲勝！拿到獎金，參加資格賽！

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 沒問題！

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 這場比賽所需要的[fff400]3分球[-]數量比上一場更多。
texten: OK.. you can dunk, but can you shoot? [fff400] Show me a 3-pointer[-] if you wanna move on.

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 上一場就已經打得如此辛苦了，這一場的條件還更嚴苛...
texten: Come on! Last level was hell and now this?

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 別擔心，這次我們的另一個夥伴是一個3分球神射手。
texten: Don't worry, this time your teammates will all  be skilled 3 Point shooters.

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 我們把機會做給他吧！！
texten: If you can't shoot yourself, try to assist one of your teammates.

title: 踏上意外旅程-4
texttw: 好！！就這麼辦！！
texten: Yeah!  Let's do this!

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 潔西卡，你到底是什麼人呀？

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 唉，其實我來自未來，來自那個即將被毀滅的時空。

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 我的主人－喬，令我回到過去，找尋可以改變未來的機會。

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 那你的主人⋯喬呢？

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 他犧牲了自己，在未來沉眠中。所以我需要你的幫助，收集能夠擊敗邪惡的力量，並且拯救我的主人。

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 好吧，雖然聽起來有點不容易，但打籃球的感覺真好。我們接下來要先做什麼呢？

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 首先得取得正式球員的資格。我打聽好了，先贏得黑幫老大的獎金，我們就能參加資格賽！

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 我已經替你報名好了，你看！你的對手多熱情啊！

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 臭小子！敢瞧不起我『絕殺比爾』？活得不耐煩了？

title: 踏上意外旅程-1
texttw: 想贏得獎金？回去再練一百年吧！

title: 成為勇士吧-1
texttw: 我們終於晉級了，一點都不困難嘛！我很有機會成為偉大的球員吧？

title: 成為勇士吧-1
texttw: 嗯～是蠻有機會的，但要追上喬的腳步，還得練很多年！

title: 成為勇士吧-1
texttw: 每次比賽前，千萬別忘了檢查『技能晶片』的搭配－

title: 成為勇士吧-1
texttw: 也別忘了在比賽中，適時地發動技能！技能能夠讓你輕鬆突破難關！

title: 成為勇士吧-1
texttw: 好～我知道了，我一定會贏得資格賽！

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 你贏得了資格賽，但你居住的貧民窟卻傳來了不好的消息－有神秘的大軍正在攻擊貧民窟！

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 不好了！我得回去看看才行！

title: 成為勇士吧-4
texttw: 這是當然囉！快走吧！
